General.Name: Sipef S.A.
General.Description: Sipef NV operates as an agro-industrial company. It operates through Palm, Rubber, Tea, and Bananas and Plants segments. The company offers crude palm oil, palm kernels, and palm kernel oil; ribbed smoked sheets, and scraps and lumps; cut, tear, and curl tea; and bananas and plants from Ivory Coast. It has operations in Indonesia, Papua New Guinea, Ivory Coast, Singapore, Europe, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1919 and is headquartered in Schoten, Belgium.
